article_title: Do Governors Make the Best Presidents?
article_text: Apparently the latest hot topic of conversation among our nation's governors is the indisputable merit of electing a governor as our next president. I don't have a lot to say about this. Instead, I offer only the brief table of postwar presidents below. If anyone can find any reason to prefer one column over the other, I'm all ears.

og.description: It's not easy to make the case.
og.title: Do governors make the best presidents?
